Eigentlich ein echt super Spiel, aber in letzter Zeit wird es immer schlimmer mit den Überlebenden. Man muss sich als Killer beleidigen lassen. Meldet man selbst Spieler, kommen nur nicht Hilfreiche Mail´s und Antworten zurück und der Spieler darf munter weiter spielen und alles und jeden beleidigen. Schreibt man dann aber selber etwas, wird direkt mit Bann etc gedroht. Wow sehr kompetenter Support !! Das Opfer zum Schuldigen machen meinen Respekt !. Langsam glaube ich, das man als Deutscher Spieler denen egal ist. Habe schon so viele Spieler wegen übler Beleidigung gemeldet, aber es ist nie was passiert. Zudem kommt man als Rang 14 Killer mit 4 Rang 1er Überlebenden in die Lobby. Wo ist das die Ausgeglichenheit ?!? Zudem sollte der Support endlich auch mal in deutsch angeboten werden. Schließlich gibt es mitlerweile genügend deutschsprachige Spieler. Es sind einige Verbesserungen fällig und vorallem eine Überarbeitung der Totemposition... diese sind auf vielen Maps einfach zu offensichtlich platziert, das es keinen Sinn ergibt überhaupt bspw. Fluch:Ruin mitzunehmen, wenn es eh binnen 10 Sekunden gefunden und zerstört ist.

Uhh.. I just got this, my friends told me I should totally get it.

So far, It's a bit confusing, especially for like just being thrown right in, but the graphics are stunning, and it reminds me of a very popular game on ROBLOX, Flee The Facility, which I think that game is based off of this one, since this one came first.

Overall, I enjoy the concept, and I would recommend anyone to buy it.

[EDIT]

Honestly I can't stop playing this game. It's such a love/hate relationship.

I sometimes do super good, and insane plays where I'm like, "HOW DID THAT NOT HIT ME?" and then the other time it's just terrible and I'm like "HOW DID THAT HIT ME?"

Really fun. I used to play a lot of zombie escape games, and this seems really similar to me.

4 Year old game still getting updates to this day, playing as survivor or killer will keep the afternoon entertained in some way. Perks in this game make the curve but also keeps the balance with how much players learn and play. Solos are best with killers but the game entertains best with a group of partied survivors.

*EDIT on my review - while I still tell everyone to play this game it's actually trying to fall into the cest pit that is known commonly at DBD. As long as you play the game and decided you want to waste hundreds of hours of your life to play this game because it doesn't know how to balance any game design then good luck. The leveling system is designed to need to grind out for days to just become a decent player because without the 12 best perks on both sides you'll lose every game and feel crushed. It's like that Star Wars game grind hours except it's made by a small company so nobody cares. And that's just in game, the community is pure trash that hates each side more than anything else. Death threats, trolls, massive insults that go way to far. Everything will be unfair, new killers won't work or break the game for the first month, SBMM doesn't work and balancing isn't a thing without the best of the best perks or "Scummy Play Styles" that each side will blast you for and will tell you things they want dead and what they did to your mother. But good luck once you're in, you can never leave.

While I may not be the best gaymer in the world, I do enjoy it. This game was difficult for me to get into at first - I have since been fully engulfed and cannot stop playing. And I genuinely do get scared at times. I do not know why I waited so long to get into this one! I love streaming this game currently - twitch.tv/edubbsy  -- 9/10
Best game ever

Das spiel ist nach kurzer Zeit eines meiner Favoriten geworden. Es ist oft lustig und macht Spaß, vor allem mit Freunden kann man richtig Spaß haben. Man braucht für das spiel eine Tacktig und es ist komplex und genau das macht es so spandesnd.

This game is quite fun but also can be extremely frustrating. You will have games that make you wanna quit a lot until you learn to out play your opponents but when you get the hang of it, it is an extremely addicting, fast pace game that will get your heart pumping super hard.

This game is especially fun when played with friends as you can communicate to each other information that will give the the upper hand in the match. Which playing with friends is super easy now due to crossplay.

Would definitely recommend this game.

Its quite difficult to start as a new survivor/killer but once you know what is going on its very addicting. at least to me. Trials are never the same with the random generated maps, unique killers, and the different perk builds you can use. A pvp horror genre game that can still make you laugh at times.
Recommend to play with friends.
Muy buena creacion

Das Spiel hat sich leider die Jahre kaum verbessert. Es sind immer die gleichen Probleme wie damals im Spiel, die den Spielspaß verdorben haben. Zum Beispiel wurde noch immer keine vernünftige Lösung gegenüber das Tunneln, Campen, etc., wenn man als Killer spielt verschrieben. So wird man des öfteren Mal in jeder Runde schon das erste Mal am Haken sterben und kaum etwas vom Spiel abkriegen. 

Das Spiel an sich wäre gut, wenn es bloß nicht diese Untermenschen hätte, die die Gameregeln nicht respektieren. Das Positive an dem Game ist, dass es ein Entwicklerteam hat, welches die Probleme im Game schnell behebt und des öfteren neue Charaktere und Events ins Game kommen. Warum dann das obige Problem noch nicht behoben worden ist oder keine etwaige Lösung vorliegt, kann ich nicht verstehen.

I can't recommend this game any longer. I quit for months at a time and then come back. it's an abusive relationship. "They've changed this time, They'll be better, maybe I can change it." It never changes, just gets worse, you can't make it better, Just avoid this, I beg of you. Killer is toxic because everyone is a jerk, Survivor is just as bad because of tunnel and camp. It's not worth the time, there are better games to play with your friends.

So listen.... There's a lot of hate on this game. Mainly because the survivors are so good and coordinated that the killers can't have any fun. And to which I ask you.... When did that ever stop the fun? Its Dead by Daylight my friends. Its not MLG Halo or COD. PLay the game to have fun, yeah it takes some skill. But you can play so many different ways. Be the killer.... and stalk them. Stare at them. Have fun with it. Your points system as the killer, doesn't rely on Eliminations. One of them is just chasing lol. 

As a survivor your never going to get as big a thrill when a killer is right on you, and yeah, your going to die. Get Eliminated cause your team might ignore you. Just start another game. INSTANTLY. Not like world of warships where you have to wait. Here's also the thing guys..... BE THE HERO. You can build your Survivor just with perks to rescue your fellow team. And when you Giver up for god and save people like 8 times. You actually get thanked; "GG man, you saved us all" -Some random. 

This game is worth the price of 21 bucks CAD. Hands down. If you have friends who own it, you are guaranteed a good time. If you like to troll and have random games of cat and mouse and mess with people and scare them. Killer is for you :)
